ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin reagent?
ygData.msgSnippet: I research my lvl 24 pet spell as soon as I reach lvl 24.  I had put all the practice points I could in research. Shadoewalker lvl 24 Necro Brell ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I research my lvl 24 pet spell as soon as I reach lvl 24. I had put all the practice points I could in research.

Shadoewalker
lvl 24 Necro
Brell
----- Original Message -----
From: Fraal
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 19, 2000 08:45 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Leatherskin reagent?


From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>


What reagent do I need to cast leatherskin the L24 Necro damage soaker?

Anyone know?? Is it still Cats Eye Agate?

Also If I JUST made 24th do you think I should try to research the L24 pet spell or get some higher lvl necro to try?

Thanks!

-Skel Lifebane
Gnome Necro
23rd circle . . .
